entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support more formats in json TimeOnlyConverter #83863
  • IsAssignableFrom isn't working with generic interfaces and classes #83858
  • MetadataLoadContext should support `Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints()` #83851
  • Wasm debugger test timing out #83847
  • Make ParameterBuilder abstract #83831
    8.0.0
  • [ARM64] Consider using LDAPR for volatile variables #83830
  • [mono] invoke delegate method thunk hit asset. #83823
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to delete an instrument inside a Meter instance #83822
  • CertificateRequest RawData #83821
  • System.OutOfMemoryException when allocating jump stub on macOS ARM64 #83818
  • mono gc: assert on !sgen_concurrent_collection_in_progress #83817
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.BootTime doesn't work on Android #83816
  • record ToString Questions and suggestions #83812
  • [wasm] Project created from wasmbrowser template doesn't respect SDK from global.json #83811
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #83825
  • [API Proposal]: ToArray and ToList overloads with length argument #83807
  • assert in mono_marshal_ilgen_init #83804
  • Optimize block unrolling operations using AVX-512 #83798
    8.0.0

Closed

  • MarshalUsing does not work with generics #74694
    8.0.0
  • AddHttpClient configuration action is never called #83772
  • watchdog still seems to be killing test runs too early #83654
  • We should enable CS1591 on projects that have migrated their docs #49120
    8.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException on decoding base64 bytes with LF characters included (>= .NET 5 only) #76918
    8.0.0
  • Optimize GC series for cases where all instance fields could be represented as a single serie #83111
    8.0.0
  • Support plan for parsing of Binary numeric literal strings, e.g., Convert.Int32("0b1011") #19642
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.ToString Methods #61719
    Future
  • Allow int.ToString and Parse to support radixes other than base-10 and base-16 #50491
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf SquareRootBenchmark #79294
  • net7: ValidationProblemDetails cannot be handled by JsonSerializerContext #83815
  • Regressions due to ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw helpers #79618
  • [API Proposal]: Enum should implement IBitwiseOperators, IEqualityOperators #81664
  • [Perf][Mono] Linux/arm64 Regressions due to rewritten of Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 #80570
  • Regressions around IndexOf #80441
  • [API Proposal]: Add analyzer for Environment.SystemDirectory #83591
  • Lazy: ValueFactory attempted to access the Value property of this instance #83163
  • Inconsistent AM- and PMDesignators within DateTimeFormat of CultureInfo #83810
  • [API Proposal]: `Vector.Contains(scalar)`, `.IndexOf(scalar)` and `LastIndexOf(scalar)` #83010
  • [API Proposal]: TryParseExplicit/ParseExplicit #83058
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.3.23159.20]The type of exception changed from TaskCanceledException to OperationCanceledException #83382
  • IndexOf-related regressions #83395
  • DisallowAllDefaultValues behaves unexpectedly for null #83797
  • Blazor WASM: Assertion error and uncaught promise in AuthorizationService.ts #81229
    8.0.0
  • TraceListenerCollection is not thread-safe #16643
    Future
  • Replace strings with resources in Mono corelib #34056
    Future
  • Update MsQuic version in helix docker images #83782
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding WriteVoidEndElement and Depth to XmlTextWriter #82091
  • Backport #63582 to net6.0 (ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER in PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister) #79959
  • can't load XmlSerializer lib on .Net 6.0 and .Net 7.0 #83572
  • can't load XmlSerializer lib on .Net 6.0 and .Net 7.0 #83662

PullRequests

Created

  • Move version.cpp out of hostcommon - only used by hostpolicy #83864
    area-Host
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add lowering for As*() and dependent methods. #83861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: experimental changes to redundant branch opts #83859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More precise fix for #83792 #83856
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Utf8.TryWrite #83852
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Handle custom modifiers on parameter constraints #83850
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][debugger] Trying to fix dereference null pointer #83849
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement the STJ.DisableDefaultReflection feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix recGetStaticFieldCurrentClass #83843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test] Remove dotnet7 feeds from NuGet.config #83841
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Reimplement DacStackReferenceWalker and DacHandleWalker #83836
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83835
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83834
  • Try to workaround #80619 #83832
    area-Build-mono
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83827
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [main] Upload buildlogs with an _Attempt suffix #83826
  • [mono][sgen] Remove outdated assertion #83824
    area-GC-mono
  • Issue 83667 #83820
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83819
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop creating "location" commas #83814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Exclude PInvoke with function pointer in TimeZoneTests from wasm compilation #83805
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Add note to doc about not specifying `hostfxr_initialize_parameters::dotnet_root` #83802
    area-Host
  • enable SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue on arm32 Ubuntu #83799
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview3] [tvOS] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83727
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix marshaller types in attributes for exception marshallers and fix non-generic managed type with generic marshaller cases #80461
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Try to work around NuGet-Migrations issue #83833
  • [mono][debugger] Trying to fix dereference null pointer #83848
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: ensure we keep throw blocks cold when combining blocks #83842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update know issues template to actually contain modifiable json #83846
    area-Meta
  • better link to open new issues in other repos #83839
    area-Meta
  • Add Symbolication to XUnitLogChecker #83702
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable xunit.analyzers in merged test groups #83806
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • When the aggressive GCCollectionMode is specified, make sure the compacting parameter is set appropriately #83708
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Load levels explanation #83840
    area-Meta
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • Update debug-dump-template.md AzDO tenant link #83845
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Using canonical All-pointers GC desc in more scenarios. #83800
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Adjust Test Watcher Timeout for Test Collections #83746
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix paths in "Stripping symbols" message #82215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • Upload buildlogs with an _Attempt suffix #83786
    area-Meta
  • Fix typo in `IEqualityComparer` comment string #83809
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Mono: Replace exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add template to open a known issue with populated JSON #83801
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] More accurate jiterpreter cfg size estimation; generate smaller dispatch tables #83759
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Stop displaying missing info in replay runs #83788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Temporary workaround for #83792 #83794
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Reduce size of async state machine by a reference field #83696
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Dump Jit flags textually in mcs #83865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Updating Unix to save/restore Avx512 state #83784
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Remove presumably-useless? serializability checks #80957
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Fix for issue #78866 and regression test #83697
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fix ordering of type initialization and stsfld #80485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • In Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator targets, respect Optimize property. #82374
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [mono] Futher cleanups to delegate invocation #83705
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, regression-from-last-release, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.6
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ignore the property with JsonIgnore when generating source code #82718
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JIT: stop copying EH tab info into inlinee compiler #83622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
